sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>The character adds boost dice per rank of Sleight of Mind to his Stealth checks unless the being attempting to detect the character is immune to Force powers.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Sleight of mind</name> <number>TAL0001129</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-23 05:40:57</sys_created_on> <sys_id>86f1c64ddb6a8c542901de90cf961937</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-23 05:40:57</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
